string.text: Hey, you said someone left a little loot for me, right?
Oh... yeah, here it is.
Perfect. I'm taking it now.

Hey, wait a second... no no, I'm not trying to steal it from you, off course it's yours. I kept it safe and you can have it now. By the way, I didn't know it maybe there was something harmful inside, and I'm not a very healthy man these days, not like in the old days... So, One hundred rubles for keeping it for you. I think it's a fair deal. OK?
Damn, your greed is like a curse! Here, take this for keeping it safe, huh...
That's fine. Take your loot.
Have you lost your mind? You'll give it here now or I'll squeal about your undercover deals!
Damn, I'm out of money right now. I'll get it later some time.
Here, take your precious bundle.
Ha ha, oh scared huh! Who are you kidding?
Newbies in the rookies camp. You can be sure they will buy nothing from you.
The Military! Guess what they will do with an illegal trader caught in the Zone?
My word is not enough! My fist will speak up! Do you want it?
I got some friends here. Very powerful people, you know.

They will buy nothing and others will buy more. This is the Zone. They can not leave the Zone. The soldiers blocked all paths, and for going deeper into the Zone they will need ammo and weapons. Where can you get those except from me? So I don't give a shit what you say to them, got it?

Ha! Ha-ha! You are really funny guy! I can't laugh enough. Where do you think I get all this equipment, all of the weapons and ammo? And who do you think is transfering artifacts from the Zone? The Military needs my business more than anyone. But you can go there, that's gonna be interesting. I wonder if they will shoot you before you say something, or maybe afterwards.
Man, if you are more greedy than me then just say it. I do not like guys who's fists are ahead of their words.
Remember, friendship ends where big money begins. And I don't care about your friends. Now they are powerful, tomorrow they will be weak. It's the Zone, understand?
Okay. One hundred rubles and you can have your stuff.
Thank you!
Got it!
You have something for me, a guy left it, right?
Yes, a small package. It is here. I almost forgot about it. Do you need it now?
Yes, I'm taking it now.
No problem, here it is.
Thank you very much.
